item.title: Vance add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Those who find ugly meanings in beautiful things are corrupt without being charming. This is a fault. Those who find beautiful meanings in beautiful things are the cultivated. For these there is hope. They are the elect to whom beautiful things mean only Beauty. There is no such thing as a moral or an immoral book. Books are well written, or badly written. That is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A thing is not necessarily true because a man dies for it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The only way to get rid of temptation is to yield to it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "No good deed goes unpunished." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There is only one thing in the world worse than being talked about, and that is not being talked about." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have nothing to declare except my genius." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The suspense is terrible. I hope it will last." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "In matters of grave importance, style, not sincerity, is the vital thing." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The basis of optimism is sheer terror." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Work is the curse of the drinking classes." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "There are two ways to dislike poetry: One is to dislike it; the other is to read Pope." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their good intellects." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I never change, except in my affections." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yet each man kills the thing he loves By each let this be heard Some do it with a bitter look Some with a flattering word The coward does it with a kiss The brave man with a sword" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Life is too short to learn German" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Vance add a quote by Quentin Crisp
item.description: "Never keep up with the Joneses. Drag them down to your level. It's cheaper." -- Quentin Crisp
